name: WORMZ II
description:
P1 Movement - WASD
P2 Movement - Arrow Keys

TWO PLAYER
EAT APPLE GROW LONG BLOCK WORM ENEMY
GO THE FIGHTER GO!

(For Duplicade! http://itch.io/jam/duplicade
Art, Code, Design by Javi Almirante
I wanted to make a two-player retro phone Snake game for fun and coding/aesthetic practice, then I stumbled upon the jam. Then some weird stuff happened, then I ended up actually using and working on the idea for the jam. It was perfect for the Twins theme, but the shameless rip part was a bit of a challenge, and thus... WORMZ II.)
